name: Semantic Kernel / .NET Agents
description: A2A agents built with Microsoft's Semantic Kernel for enterprise .NET and cross-platform deployments.

agentNotes.a2a-semantic-kernel-dotnet: C# integration with dynamic Semantic Kernel functions and repositories
agentNotes.agent2agent: Multi-agent proof-of-concept combining Semantic Kernel with Blazor UI
agentNotes.a2a-sample-semantickernel: Official Python sample for Semantic Kernel A2A integration
agentNotes.semantic-kernel-agent-a2a-protocol-examp: C# example with discovery service for enterprise .NET deployments
